title: 148863996.time Is Of The Essence
excerpt: Something I've learned from 7 years of working in time-sensitive jobs:

children.text: Something I've learned from 7 years of working in time-sensitive jobs:
Time--not money--is what creates quality results which enables good outcomes.
If you’re short on time, you won’t have enough to deliver over the top results, which means that you’ll always fall short of the outcomes you want.
This is why it’s imperative to create slack in the system, by constantly looking for ways to save time and not squander it.
Because, time in infinitely valuable. You only have so much of it. And, what you spend you can’t get back.
